channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse Foundation -- Eclipse OpenJ9
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse Foundation -- Eclipse OpenJ9

item.title: CVE-2023-2597|2024-07-05T20:11:57.497Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- eclipse%20openj9
item.description: In Eclipse Openj9 before version 0.38.0, in the implementation of the shared cache (which is enabled by default in OpenJ9 builds) the size of a string is not properly checked against the size of the buffer.
